#VACCINE UPDATE❗ Grand Forks has expanded #COVID19 vaccinations to the general public, including  all UND students, faculty and staff.

➡️ Log in to https://t.co/vldNt9c1MD or call the COVID-19 hotline at 701.780.6358 to schedule an appointment.
